## BatchOperation type

Provides information about batch operation on the list of subjects.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type BatchOperation = {
    $type?: string;
    Operation?: string;
    Parameters?: ParametersDictionary;
    Statuses?: Array<BatchOperationStatus>;
    SubjectLinks?: Array<Link>;
};
```
